standardCommon.name: Strike
standardCommon.text: Attack with a weapon or unarmed attack.

standardCommon.name: Cast a Spell
standardCommon.text: Cast a spell you have prepared or in your repertoire.

standardCommon.name: Raise a Shield
standardCommon.text: Put up a shield to get its bonus to AC.

standardUncommon.name: Activate An Item
standardUncommon.text: Call forth the effect of an item by properly activating it.

standardUncommon.name: Aid
standardUncommon.text: DC 20 check to give a +1 circumstance bonus to assisted skill check or attack roll (crit success: +2, +3 if master, +4 if legendary).

standardUncommon.name: Delay
standardUncommon.text: Select this when your turn begins; take your turn later.

standardUncommon.name: Dismiss
standardUncommon.text: End one spell effect or magic item effect.

standardUncommon.name: Interact
standardUncommon.text: Grab an object, open a door, draw an item, or do a similar action.

standardUncommon.name: Mount
standardUncommon.text: Get on an allied animal bigger than you to ride it.

standardUncommon.name: Ready
standardUncommon.text: Prepare to take a single/free action as a reaction with a given trigger.

standardUncommon.name: Release
standardUncommon.text: Release something you’re holding without triggering reactions.

standardUncommon.name: Sustain a Spell/Activation
standardUncommon.text: Extend a spell or item effect until the end of your next turn.

standardUncommon.name: Take Cover
standardUncommon.text: Gain cover (or get greater cover if you have cover).

StandardSituational.name: Avert Gaze
StandardSituational.text: Get a +2 circumstance bonus against visual abilities.

StandardSituational.name: Escape
StandardSituational.text: Attempt to get free when grabbed, restrained, or immobilized. Use unarmed attack modifier, Acrobatics, or Athletics.

StandardSituational.name: Grab an Edge
StandardSituational.text: Try to catch something to stop a fall.

StandardSituational.name: Leap
StandardSituational.text: Jump horizontally 10 feet (15 feet if your Speed is 30 feet or more), or vertically 3 feet and horizontally 5 feet.

StandardSituational.name: Seek
StandardSituational.text: Scan an area for signs of creatures/objects using Perception.

StandardSituational.name: Sense Motive
StandardSituational.text: See if a creature is lying.

SkillActions.name: Balance
SkillActions.text: Move across narrow surface or uneven ground.

SkillActions.name: Tumble Through
SkillActions.text: Move through the space of one enemy.

SkillActions.name: Maneuver in Flight
SkillActions.text: Perform a difficult maneuver while flying.

SkillActions.name: Recall Knowledge
SkillActions.text: Remember a bit of knowledge.

SkillActions.name: Climb
SkillActions.text: Move up, down, or across an incline.

SkillActions.name: Force Open
SkillActions.text: Forcefully open a door, window, or container.

SkillActions.name: Grapple
SkillActions.text: Grab an opponent with your free hand.

SkillActions.name: High Jump
SkillActions.text: Stride and then make a vertical Leap.

SkillActions.name: Long Jump
SkillActions.text: Stride and then make a horizontal Leap.

SkillActions.name: Shove
SkillActions.text: Push an opponent away from you.

SkillActions.name: Swim
SkillActions.text: Propel yourself through water.

SkillActions.name: Trip
SkillActions.text: Knock an opponent to the ground.

SkillActions.name: Disarm
SkillActions.text: Knock something out of an opponent’s grasp.

SkillActions.name: Recall Knowledge
SkillActions.text: Remember a bit of knowledge.

SkillActions.name: Create a Diversion
SkillActions.text: Draw creatures’ attention elsewhere.

SkillActions.name: Lie
SkillActions.text: Fool someone with an untruth.

SkillActions.name: Feint
SkillActions.text: Leave an opponent unprepared for your attack.

SkillActions.name: Request
SkillActions.text: Make a request of a friendly or helpful creature.

SkillActions.name: Demoralize
SkillActions.text: Shake an enemy’s resolve.

SkillActions.name: Recall Knowledge
SkillActions.text: Remember a bit of knowledge.

SkillActions.name: Administer First Aid
SkillActions.text: Perform first aid on a dying/bleeding creature.

SkillActions.name: Recall Knowledge
SkillActions.text: Remember a bit of knowledge.

SkillActions.name: Treat Poison
SkillActions.text: Treat a patient to prevent the spread of poison.

SkillActions.name: Command an Animal
SkillActions.text: Issue an order to an animal.

SkillActions.name: Recall Knowledge
SkillActions.text: Remember a bit of knowledge.

SkillActions.name: Recall Knowledge
SkillActions.text: Remember a bit of knowledge.

SkillActions.name: Perform
SkillActions.text: Make a brief performance (song, dance, joke).

SkillActions.name: Recall Knowledge
SkillActions.text: Remember a bit of knowledge.

SkillActions.name: Recall Knowledge
SkillActions.text: Remember a bit of knowledge.

SkillActions.name: Conceal an Object
SkillActions.text: Hide a small object (light bulk) on your person.

SkillActions.name: Hide
SkillActions.text: Use cover or concealment to become hidden.

SkillActions.name: Sneak
SkillActions.text: Move to another place while being undetected.

SkillActions.name: Palm an Object
SkillActions.text: Palm a small, unattended object.

SkillActions.name: Steal
SkillActions.text: Take a small object from another creature.

SkillActions.name: Disable Device
SkillActions.text: Disarm a trap or another complex device.

SkillActions.name: Pick a Lock
SkillActions.text: Open a lock without a key.

ExplorationGeneral.name: Avoid Notice
ExplorationGeneral.text: Travel stealthily at half speed and use Stealth for initiative.

ExplorationGeneral.name: Defend
ExplorationGeneral.text: Move at half speed with your shield raised.

ExplorationGeneral.name: Detect Magic
ExplorationGeneral.text: Cast detect magic regularly while moving at half speed.

ExplorationGeneral.name: Follow the Expert
ExplorationGeneral.text: Match the tactic of an expert to gain a bonus to a skill check.

ExplorationGeneral.name: Hustle
ExplorationGeneral.text: Move at double speed for Con (min. 1) × 10 minutes.

ExplorationGeneral.name: Investigate
ExplorationGeneral.text: Seek out information about your surroundings at half speed.

ExplorationGeneral.name: Refocus
ExplorationGeneral.text: Perform deeds to restore 1 focus point to your focus pool.

ExplorationGeneral.name: Repeat a Spell
ExplorationGeneral.text: Cast the same spell (usually a cantrip) repeatedly at half speed.

ExplorationGeneral.name: Scout
ExplorationGeneral.text: Scout ahead and behind to watch for danger at half speed.

ExplorationGeneral.name: Search
ExplorationGeneral.text: Seek meticulously for hidden features at half speed (or slower).
